name: tex-board
title: TeX Board
description: A LaTeX-friendly clipboard tool for creating and copying equations. Supports both LaTeX and MathML formats.

commands.name: tex-board
commands.title: Tex Board
commands.subtitle: Manage your TeX clipboard
commands.description: Create, store, and reuse formulas. Copy them as LaTeX or MathML anytime.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
